servinfo.title: DTC P3031: Exhaust Gas Temperature Sensor 2 Threshold Overshoot Failures During After-sales Regeneration

attention2.ptxt: The fault is present because the exhaust gas temperature sensor 2 detects over 700 °C, 1292 °F while the diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration was in progress.

attention3.ptxt: If the fault is present, the diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration is failed in progress.

entry.ptxt: Cooling down engine until “Diesel PF inlet Temp” under “Data list” of SUZUKI scan tool decreases to 200 °C (392 °F) or less.
Turn ignition switch to OFF position and wait for 15 min.
Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Clear DTC referring to DTC Clearance:F9Q .
Carry out after sales regeneration referring to Diesel Particulate Filter After-Sales Regeneration Procedure:F9Q .
If the fault is still present, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
